meta.content: Front Page; New York and Region
meta.name: online_sections

block.p: New Focus on Mideast Pact The United States is prepared to convene a new summit meeting if the Palestinians and Israelis can resolve outstanding issues, but the window of opportunity is expected to run only through September. PAGE A9

Mexico Seeks Open Border Mexico's President-elect said that he would press the United States to open the border to Mexican workers and that both countries would gain if Mexico could become a more equal economic partner. PAGE A8

AIDS and Africa's Teachers In Ivory Coast and elsewhere in Africa, where many educational systems are already troubled, AIDS has had a devastating toll on teachers. If unchecked, the trend could prove catastrophic. PAGE A6
County Clears Welfare Rolls Not a single person in Schuyler County, Ill., is on welfare, a situation that illustrates profound changes in the system nationwide. PAGE A12

New Focus on Mideast Pact The United States is prepared to convene a new summit meeting if the Palestinians and Israelis can resolve outstanding issues, but the window of opportunity is expected to run only through September. PAGE A9

Mexico Seeks Open Border Mexico's President-elect said that he would press the United States to open the border to Mexican workers and that both countries would gain if Mexico could become a more equal economic partner. PAGE A8

AIDS and Africa's Teachers In Ivory Coast and elsewhere in Africa, where many educational systems are already troubled, AIDS has had a devastating toll on teachers. If unchecked, the trend could prove catastrophic. PAGE A6
County Clears Welfare Rolls Not a single person in Schuyler County, Ill., is on welfare, a situation that illustrates profound changes in the system nationwide. PAGE A12
